dr_org_friendly_id.field_description: the direct recipient that uploaded the record

error_description.field_description: This describes the error for each error record

error_id.field_description: Primary Key: Unique characters to indentify the error record. Act as primary key in this table

error_row.field_description: this is the in-line doc for field

header_name.field_description: the column in the record json that caused the record to be bad data

module_id.field_description: the module table number where the error occured

record.field_description: JSON object of the data that was ingested into the module table that was revoked

sr_org_friendly_id.field_description: the sub-recipeint that uploaded the record

station_id.field_description: the station_id the error record  is associated with

timestamp.field_description: time when error was detected in upload

upload_id.field_description: the upload_id for the error that is linked to the import_metadata table.  MUL value indicates this field is indexed.

ev_error_data.table_description: Errors detected during validation of module uploads

comments.field_description: provided by the DR reviewer of the submission when approving or rejecting

module_id.field_description: module ID of the uploaded data

org_id.field_description: UUID of the organization (DR or SR) that uploaded the module data

parent_org.field_description: UUID of the DR for which module data was uploaded.  If uploaded by DR user, org_id and parent_id will be the same

quarter.field_description: quarter reporting period for submission data.  Null for one-time and annual modules.

submission_status.field_description: status of submission, one of list of enumerated values

updated_by.field_description: email identifier of who submitted the submission data

updated_on.field_description: time of initial upload or submission status change

upload_friendly_id.field_description: future use--a simple unique character for identifing the metadata record

upload_id.field_description: Primary Key: unique identifier for each data import

year.field_description: reporting year for the submission data

import_metadata.table_description: track status for all valid uploads

changed_data.field_description: JSON object of data modified in record

id.field_description: auto-generated unique ID for history table

updated_by.field_description: email identifier of who performed action on metadata record

import_metadata_history.table_description: track changes to records in import_metadata via trigger

executed_on.field_description: when script was executed in this environment

migration.table_description: track incremental changes made to schemas

charger_id.field_description: This attribute identifies a single charger. A charger (or post) is a device with one or more charging ports and connectors for charging EVs.

connector_id.field_description: This attribute identifies a single connector. A connector is a device that attaches the charging port to an EV's charging inlet to transfer electricity.

energy_kwh.field_description: Amount of energy (in kilowatt-hours) dispensed by the port (port ID) during the charging session (session ID).

error_other.field_description: The description for any other error codes associated with an unsuccessful charging session that are not categorized in the recommended error codes in session_error

network_provider.field_description: The name of the entity that operates the digital communication network that remotely manages the chargers.

network_provider_upload.field_description: friendly name of network provider at the time of upload, retained in case value changed after upload

payment_method.field_description: Method(s) of payment used to complete the charging session (session ID).

payment_other.field_description: The description for any method(s) of payment used to complete the charging session that are not categorized in the recommended payment methods in payment_method

port_id_upload.field_description: Port ID at the time of upload (may be different than current)

port_uuid.field_description: port unique identifier, matches value in station_ports table

power_kw.field_description: Maximum power (in kilowatts) dispensed by the port (port ID) during charging session (session ID).

session_end.field_description: Timestamp identifying when the charging session was completed

session_error.field_description: Any error codes associated with an unsuccessful charging session.

session_id.field_description: This uniquely identifies each charging session

session_start.field_description: Timestamp identifying when the charging session became active in the platform of the charging network provider

station_id_upload.field_description: Station ID at the time of upload, retained in case value changed after upload

station_uuid.field_description: station unique identifier, matches station_registrations table, not visible to user

upload_id.field_description: unique identifier for upload, matches value in import_metadata

user_reports_no_data.field_description: set to 1 (true) for records that follow guidance for no data during reporting period

network_provider.field_description: The name of the entity that operates the digital communication network that remotely manages the chargers.

network_provider_upload.field_description: friendly name of network provider at the time of upload, retained in case value changed after upload

port_id_upload.field_description: Port ID at the time of upload (may be different than current)

port_uuid.field_description: port unique identifier, matches value in station_ports table

station_id_upload.field_description: Station ID at the time of upload, retained in case value changed after upload

station_uuid.field_description: station unique identifier, matches station_registrations table, not visible to user

total_outage.field_description: The total time (in minutes) during the previous year where the charging port (port ID) did not successfully dispense electricity as expected.

total_outage_excl.field_description: The total time (in minutes) during the previous year where the charging port (port ID) did not successfully dispense electricity as expected for reasons outside the charging station operator's control.

upload_id.field_description: unique identifier for upload, matches value in import_metadata

uptime.field_description: the time over the previous 12 months when a charger's hardware and software are both online and available for use or in use, and the charging port successfully dispenses electricity in accordance with requirements for minimum power level.

uptime_reporting_end.field_description: Timestamp identifying the end date of the reporting period for port uptime, total outage, and total excluded outage.

uptime_reporting_start.field_description: Timestamp identifying the start date of the reporting period for port uptime, total outage, and total excluded outage.

user_reports_no_data.field_description: set to 1 (true) for records that follow guidance for no data during reporting period

network_provider.field_description: The name of the entity that operates the digital communication network that remotely manages the chargers.

network_provider_upload.field_description: friendly name of network provider at the time of upload, retained in case value changed after upload

outage_duration.field_description: Length of time (in minutes) during which the charging port (port ID) could not successfully dispense electricity

outage_id.field_description: Timestamp uniquely identifying a single instance of an outage for a given charging port

excluded_outage.field_description: this is the in-line doc for field

excluded_outage_reason.field_description: this is the in-line doc for field

excluded_outage_notes.field_description: this is the in-line doc for field

caas.field_description: Indicator for whether the total maintenance and repair cost at the charging station (Station ID) is reported as a total cost from a "charging-as-a-service" agreement that does not provide itemized maintenance and repair costs; the total cost may include equipment acquisition, installation, and other services.

maintenance_cost_federal.field_description: Total amount paid for maintenance and repair at the charging station (Station ID) during the calendar year specified in "maintenance and repair cost reporting year" with federal funding.

maintenance_cost_total.field_description: Total amount paid for maintenance and repair at the charging station (Station ID) during the calendar year specified in "maintenance and repair cost reporting year."

maintenance_notes.field_description: Additional description that explains the maintenance and repair cost data.

maintenance_report_end.field_description: Timestamp identifying the end date associated with reported maintenance and repair costs
maintenance_report_end.display_name: Maintenance and Repair Cost Reporting End Date

maintenance_report_start.field_description: Timestamp identifying the start date associated with reported maintenance and repair costs
maintenance_report_start.display_name: Field Maintenance and Repair Cost Reporting Start Date

network_provider.field_description: The name of the entity that operates the digital communication network that remotely manages the chargers.

network_provider_upload.field_description: friendly name of network provider at the time of upload, retained in case value changed after upload

project_id.field_description: Federal Award Identification Number (FAIN) or other identifiers that uniquely identify the NEVI Formula Program project and/or the grant awarded

station_id_upload.field_description: Station ID at the time of upload, retained in case value changed after upload

station_uuid.field_description: station unique identifier, matches station_registrations table, not visible to user

operator_address.field_description: The street address specifying the headquarters of the charging station operator

operator_city.field_description: The name of the incorporated municipality (or other general-purpose local governmental unit) in which the headquarters of the charging station operator is located

operator_name.field_description: The entity that owns the chargers and supporting equipment and facilities at one or more charging stations

operator_notes.field_description: Additional description that explains station operator data

operator_state.field_description: Two-character USPS abbreviation indicating the state (or state equivalent) in which the headquarters of the charging station operator is located

operator_type.field_description: Indicator for what type of involvement the private entity (station operator name) has at the charging station

operator_zip.field_description: The 5-digit code that identifies the individual post office or metropolitan area delivery station associated with the address of the headquarters of the charging station operator

operator_zip_extended.field_description: A 4-digit extension of the 5-digit station operator ZIP code

opportunity_program.field_description: The type of state or local business opportunity certification program(s) for all private entities involved in the operation and maintenance of chargers participated in during the calendar year specified in opportunity program reporting year

program_descript.field_description: The description of opportunity_program if "other" is chosen from the recommended opportunity programs.
